body: As more and more South Korean politicians opened their Twitter and Facebook accounts, Son Ji-hoon (@mazefind) tweeted a google excel sheet[ko] where almost every politician's social networks accounts are listed.
original_body: As more and more South Korean politicians opened their Twitter and Facebook accounts, Son Ji-hoon (@mazefind) tweeted a google excel sheet[ko] where almost every politician's social networks accounts are listed.
title: South Korea:Politicians' Social Network Accounts Tweeting Around
